SetColor.description:
DIMAGEBUTTON [Client] 

[table] color
  The Color to set

SetImage.description:
DIMAGEBUTTON [Client] 

[string] strImage
  The path of the image to load. When no file extension is supplied the VMT file extension is used.

[string] strBackup
  The path of the backup image.

SetImageVisible.description:
DIMAGEBUTTON [Client] 

[boolean] visible
  Set true to make it visible ( default ), or false to hide the image

SetKeepAspect.description:
DIMAGEBUTTON [Client] 

[boolean] keep
  true to keep the aspect ratio, false not to

SetMaterial.description:
DIMAGEBUTTON [Client] 

[IMaterial] mat
  The material to set

SetStretchToFit.description:
DIMAGEBUTTON [Client] 

[boolean] stretch
  True to stretch, false to not to stretch
